content_descriptors.notes:
Axyn Adventure contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-Sex Scenes (consensual, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters.
-Male on Male, gay content
-Foot fetish, exhbitionnism
-All characters in The Axyn Adventure are 18+ and over

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4
  • Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce MX150 / Vega 8 or better with 2GB of Graphics Memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: The game is optimized for a wide range of hardware, but a dedicated GPU is recommended for the best experience.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4
  • Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce MX150 / Vega 8 or better with 2GB of Graphics Memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: The game is optimized for a wide range of hardware, but a dedicated GPU is recommended for the best experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64Bit). or Linux (Steam OS)
  • Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 5 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series, Radeon HD 8000 Series
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64Bit). or Linux (Steam OS)
  • Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series, Radeon HD 8000 Series
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
